facts: Concert venue contracted with performer for show on March 15
Government ordered all venues closed due to pandemic
Closure was not foreseeable at contract formation
Neither party was at fault for the closure
asp_facts: contract(c1). impossibility(c1, yes). supervening_event(c1, pandemic_closure). foreseeability(c1, no). fault(c1, neither_party). performance_impossible(c1, yes). basic_assumption(c1, venue_available). risk_allocated(c1, no). discharge(c1, yes).
question: Is the performer discharged from the contract?
rationale: Supervening impossibility discharges contractual duties when performance becomes impossible due to an event that was not foreseeable and not the fault of either party. The government closure made performance impossible and discharges both parties.
